name: electronic-voting-system
description: A secure and transparent electronic voting platform with React frontend and Node.js/Express backend

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "FRONTEND,BACKEND" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix backend
scripts.install:all: npm install -g concurrently && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
